alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lexington; Newberry; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fairfield, east central Newberry, north central Lexington and northwestern Richland Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 624 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jenkinsville, or near VC Summer Nuclear Station, moving southeast at 20 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Irmo, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Monticello, Ballentine, Jenkinsville, Chapin, Little Mountain, Pomaria, Peak, Lighthouse Marina, Lake Murray Marina, Bundrick Island, Putnam`s Landing, White Rock, Upper Richland Fire Station, Pine Island, Cedar Creek Fire Station and Melvin Park. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 82 and 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
